text:
taratiq tara#ti brahmahaqtyAM ~MyO$&SvamEqdhEnaq yaja#tEq ya u# cainamEqvaM ~MvEdOtta#raqM ~Mvai 
tat praqjApa#tEqrakShya#Svayaqt tasmAqdaSva#syOttaraqtO&va# dyanti dakShiNaqtO$&nyEShA$M paSUqnAM ~Mvai#taqsaH kaTO# BavatyaqPsuyO#niqrvA aSvO$&PsuqjO vE#taqsaH sva EqvainaqM ~MyOnauq prati#ShThApayati catuShTOqmaH stOmO# Bavati saqraDDhaq vA aSva#syaq sakthyA&vRu#haqt ( ) tad-dEqvASca#tuShTOqmEnaiqva pratya#dadhuqryacca#tuShTOqmaH stOmOq BavaqtyaSva#sya sarvaqtvAya# || 48 
(sarva#ma pAqpmAna# - mavRuhaqd - dvAda#Sa ca) (A12)

Prasna Korvai with starting Padams of 1 to 12 Anuvaakams :- 
(uqthsaqnnaqyaqj~ja - indrA$gnI - dEqvA vA a#kShNayAstOqmIyA# - aqgnErBAqgO$ - &syagnE# jAqtAn - raqSmiriti# - nAkaqsadBiqH -CandA(gm)#siq - sarvA$ByO - vRuShTiqsanI$ - rdEvAsuqrAH kanI#yA(gm)saH - praqjApa#tEqrakShiq - dvAda#Sa )

Korvai with starting Padams of 1, 11, 21 Series of Panchaatis :-
(uqthsaqnnaqyaqj~jO - dEqvA vai - yasyaq muKya#vatI - rnAkaqsadBi#rEq - vai tABi#raq - ShTAca#tvAri(gm)Sat)

First and Last Padam of Third Prasnam of 5th Kandam
(uqthsaqnnaqyaqj~jaH - sa#rvaqtvAya#)

|| hari#H OM ||

|| kRuShNa yajurvEdIya taittirIya saMhitAyAM pa~jcamakANDE tRutIyaH praSnaH samAptaH ||
------------------------------------

OM namaH paramAtmanE, SrI mahAgaNapatayE namaH, SrI guruByO namaH
haqriqH OM

5.4	 pa~jcamakANDE caturthaH praSnaH - iShTakAtrayABidhAnaM
